history.proof: intros net h h' H_ref H_type H_pred. unfold type in H_type. unfold getNextIndex in H_pred. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llli: logs_leaderLogs_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
llsli: leaderLogs_sublog_interface
lsli: leader_sublog_interface
nisi: nextIndex_safety_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
aelmi: allEntries_log_matching_interface
aertsi: append_entries_request_term_sanity_interface
aelsi: allEntries_leader_sublog_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (h' : name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h') <> 0 -> exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) (Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h')) = Some e

Premises:
Record leaderLogs_sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface { leaderLogs_sorted_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sorted net } Arguments leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sublog_interface { leaderLogs_sublog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sublog net } Arguments leaderLogs_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record allEntries_log_matching_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_allEntries_log_matching_interface { allEntries_log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> allEntries_log_matching net } Arguments allEntries_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_allEntries_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record logs_leaderLogs_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_logs_leaderLogs_interface { logs_leaderLogs_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_leaderLogs net; logs_leaderLogs_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_leaderLogs_nw net } Arguments logs_leaderLogs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_logs_leaderLogs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do
Record leader_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leader_sublog_interface { leader_sublog_invariant_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leader_sublog_invariant net } Arguments leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_contiguous_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_contiguous_interface { leaderLogs_contiguous_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_contiguous net } Arguments leaderLogs_contiguous_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_contiguous_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record append_entries_request_term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_append_entries_request_term_sanity_interface { append_entries_request_term_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> append_entries_request_term_sanity net } Arguments append_entries_request_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_append_entries_request_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
Record one_leaderLog_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface { one_leaderLog_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term net; one_leaderLog_per_term_log_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_log net; one_leaderLog_per_term_host_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_host net } Arguments one_leader
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface { entries_contiguous_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net; entries_gt_0_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net; entries_sorted_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted_nw net; entries_gt_0
Record nextIndex_safety_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_nextIndex_safety_interface { nextIndex_safety_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nextIndex_safety net } Arguments nextIndex_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_nextIndex_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record allEntries_leader_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_allEntries_leader_sublog_interface { allEntries_leader_sublog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> allEntries_leader_sublog net } Arguments allEntries_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_allEntries_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Notation pred := Init.Nat.pred
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
getNextIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) => assoc_default name_eq_dec (nextIndex state) h (maxIndex (log state)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> name -> logIndex Arguments getNextIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Notation type := (RaftState.type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
nextIndex_safety = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (h' : name), type (nwState net h) = Leader -> Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (nwState net h) h') <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments nextIndex_safety {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lift_leader_sublog : forall (net : network) (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader)))
leaderLogs_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) ->...-> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
allEntries_leader_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments allEntries_leader_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) ->...-> Prop Arguments logs_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lift_leader_sublog_nw : forall (net : network) (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader)))
entries_match_invariant : forall (net : network) (h h' : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))
doLeader_spec : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (pli = 0 /\ plt = 0 /\ es = findGtIndex (log st) 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt) /\ es...
entries_gt_0 = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0 {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface : (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0 net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted net) ->...-> refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
log_log_prefix_within_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h h' : Net.name, prefix_within_term (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h'))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_log_prefix_within_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
log_leaderLogs_prefix_within_term = fun net : network => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (leader : Net.name), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) -> prefix_within_term (log (snd (nwState net h))) ll : network -> Prop
allEntries_log_matching = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e e' : entry) (h h' : Net.name), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h')))) -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> e = e' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments allEntries_log_matching {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_match_nw_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e'' es ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
entries_contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, contiguous_range_exact_lo (log (snd (nwState net h))) 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_contiguous {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
entries_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, sorted (log (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
allEntries_log_prefix_within_term = fun net : network => forall h h' : Net.name, prefix_within_term (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) (log (snd (nwState net h'))) : network -> Prop
leader_sublog_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) ->...-> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
allEntries_gt_0_invariant : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eIndex e > 0
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n

```coq
intros net h h' H_ref H_type H_pred.
unfold type in H_type.
unfold getNextIndex in H_pred.
destruct (assoc_default name_eq_dec (nextIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h') (maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))))).
- exists e. reflexivity.
- contradiction.
Qed.
